# Getting Started - Vendor Guide

**Navigation**: [Home](../README.md) > [Vendor Documentation](./README.md) > Getting Started

Welcome to the Vendor Portal! This guide will help you get started as a vendor user and walk you through submitting your first products.

## Vendor Role Overview

As a vendor user, you are responsible for submitting product information to the portal for review and approval by administrators. Once approved, your products will be synchronized to Catsy (Product Information Management system) for publication.

### Key Responsibilities

- **Product Data Preparation**: Gathering accurate product information including names, SKUs, descriptions, and attributes
- **Template Creation**: Building Excel templates with the appropriate categories and attributes
- **Data Entry**: Filling in product information in Excel templates
- **File Upload**: Uploading completed Excel files through the portal
- **Quality Control**: Ensuring data accuracy and completeness before submission
- **Status Monitoring**: Tracking batch status and responding to feedback
- **Issue Resolution**: Correcting and resubmitting products if rejected

### Vendor Capabilities

You have access to the following features:

- Build custom Excel templates based on product categories
- Upload product data via Excel files
- View all your submitted products and their statuses
- Track batch approval status and timeline
- Receive notifications about batch status changes
- View rejection feedback and resubmit corrected products
- Manage your profile and preferences

## First-Time Login

### Accessing the Vendor Portal

1. Open your web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, or Safari recommended)
2. Navigate to the Vendor Portal URL provided by your administrator
3. You will see the sign-in page

### Signing In

1. Enter your **email address** provided by the administrator
2. Enter your **password** (temporary password if first login)
3. Click the **Sign In** button
4. You will be redirected to the Vendor Dashboard

**Note**: If this is your first login with a temporary password, you will be prompted to change it. Follow the on-screen instructions to set a new, secure password.

### Password Requirements

Your password must meet these security requirements:

- Minimum 8 characters in length
- At least one uppercase letter
- At least one lowercase letter
- At least one number
- At least one special character (e.g., !@#$%^&*)

### Forgot Password?

If you forget your password:

1. Click the **Forgot Password?** link on the sign-in page
2. Enter your email address
3. Check your email for password reset instructions
4. Follow the link in the email to create a new password

For more details, see the [Authentication Guide](../common/authentication.md).

## Navigation Overview

Once logged in, you'll see the vendor interface with several key navigation elements:

### Sidebar Menu

The left sidebar provides access to all major sections:

- **Dashboard** - Overview of your submissions with statistics and recent activity
- **Template** - Build Excel templates for product uploads
- **Upload** - Upload completed Excel files with product data
- **Batches** - View and track your batch submissions
- **Products** - View all your submitted products

### Top Navigation Bar

The top bar includes:

- **Vendor Portal** logo - Click to return to the dashboard
- **Notification bell** - View notifications about batch status updates
- **User menu** - Access your profile, settings, and sign out option

### Notification Center

Click the bell icon in the top-right corner to:

- View notifications about batch approvals or rejections
- See upload progress updates
- Access important messages from administrators
- Mark notifications as read

### User Menu

Click your name or avatar in the top-right corner to:

- View your profile information
- Access settings and preferences
- Sign out of the vendor portal

## Understanding the Dashboard

The Vendor Dashboard is your home base and provides an overview of your product submissions:

### Statistics Cards

Four key metrics displayed at the top:

- **Products Submitted** - Total number of products you've uploaded
- **Approved** - Products that have been approved by administrators
- **Pending Review** - Products currently awaiting admin review
- **Rejected** - Products that were rejected and need correction

### My Batches Section

Shows your recent batch submissions:

- Batch number and filename
- Number of products in the batch
- Upload date and time
- Current status (Pending, Approved, or Rejected)
- Quick action button to view details

**Status Indicators**:
- 游리 **Pending** - Awaiting admin review
- 游릭 **Approved** - Products accepted and ready for Catsy sync
- 游댮 **Rejected** - Products need correction and resubmission

### Status Distribution Chart

Visual representation of your product statuses:

- Pie chart showing the breakdown of approved, pending, and rejected products
- Helps you understand the overall health of your submissions

### Recent Activity

List of recent actions and updates:

- Recent product uploads
- Batch status changes
- Approval or rejection notifications

For more details, see the [Dashboard Guide](./dashboard.md).

## Key Concepts

Before submitting products, familiarize yourself with these important concepts:

### Products

Individual items you submit for approval:

- Each product has basic information (name, SKU, description)
- Products have attributes (color, size, material, etc.)
- Products are assigned to categories
- Products go through an approval workflow

### Batches

A collection of products uploaded together via Excel file:

- Each upload creates a new batch
- Batches have a unique batch number
- Batches are reviewed and approved/rejected as a whole
- You can track batch status from submission to approval

### Excel Templates

Pre-formatted Excel files for uploading products:

- Templates are generated based on selected categories and attributes
- Templates have protected headers to prevent errors
- You fill in product data in the template rows
- Templates ensure data is in the correct format

### Categories

Hierarchical classification system for organizing products:

- Products must be assigned to a category
- Categories are synced from Catsy
- You select categories when building templates
- Categories help organize and classify your products

### Attributes

Product characteristics or properties:

- Attributes define what information you can provide (e.g., Color, Size, Material)
- Some attributes are required, others are optional
- Available attributes depend on your organization's permissions
- Attributes are selected when building templates

### Attribute Groups

Collections of related attributes:

- Your administrator assigns attribute groups to your organization
- Attribute groups control which attributes you can use
- Different vendors may have access to different attribute groups
- Helps organize attributes by product type or vendor needs

### Validation

Automatic checking of your uploaded data:

- The system validates your data when you upload
- Validation checks for required fields, data formats, and business rules
- Validation errors must be fixed before submission
- Preview screen shows validation results

### Approval Workflow

The process your products go through:

1. **Upload** - You upload products via Excel
2. **Pending** - Products await admin review
3. **Review** - Admin reviews your batch
4. **Approved/Rejected** - Admin makes a decision
5. **Catsy Sync** - Approved products sync to Catsy (done by admin)

## Quick Start: Submitting Your First Products

Follow these steps to submit your first batch of products:

### Step 1: Build an Excel Template

1. Click **Template** in the sidebar
2. Select the **category** for your products from the category tree
3. Select the **attributes** you need for your products
4. Click **Generate Template**
5. Download the Excel file to your computer

**Tip**: Start with a single category for your first upload to keep things simple.

See [Template Builder](./template-builder.md) for detailed instructions.

### Step 2: Fill in the Template

1. Open the downloaded Excel file in Microsoft Excel
2. **Do not modify the header row** (it's protected)
3. Fill in your product data starting from row 2
4. Ensure all **required fields** are completed (marked with asterisks)
5. Follow the data format guidelines in the template
6. Save the file when complete

**Tips**:
- Start with 5-10 products for your first upload
- Double-check SKUs for accuracy
- Ensure all required fields are filled
- Use consistent formatting

### Step 3: Upload the File

1. Click **Upload** in the sidebar
2. Click **Choose File** or drag and drop your Excel file
3. Wait for the file to upload and validate
4. Review any validation errors on the preview screen
5. If there are errors, download the file, fix them, and re-upload
6. If validation passes, click **Confirm Upload**

See [Product Upload](./product-upload.md) for detailed instructions.

### Step 4: Track Your Batch

1. After upload, you'll see a success message with your batch number
2. Click **Batches** in the sidebar to view your batch
3. Your batch will show as **Pending** status
4. Wait for the administrator to review your batch
5. You'll receive a notification when the batch is approved or rejected

See [Batch Tracking](./batch-tracking.md) for detailed instructions.

### Step 5: Respond to Feedback (if rejected)

If your batch is rejected:

1. Check your **notifications** for the rejection alert
2. Open the **batch detail page** to view feedback
3. Read the administrator's comments carefully
4. Download your original file or create a new template
5. Correct the issues mentioned in the feedback
6. Upload the corrected file as a new batch

## Quick Start Checklist

Use this checklist for your first submission:

### Before You Start

- [ ] **Receive your login credentials** from the administrator
- [ ] **Complete your first login** and change your password
- [ ] **Explore the dashboard** to familiarize yourself with the layout
- [ ] **Review the navigation menu** and understand where each section is located

### Prepare Your First Upload

- [ ] **Gather product information** you want to submit (5-10 products recommended)
- [ ] **Identify the product category** your products belong to
- [ ] **List the attributes** you need (color, size, material, etc.)
- [ ] **Ensure you have accurate SKUs** for all products

### Build and Fill Template

- [ ] **Go to the Template page** and select your category
- [ ] **Select the attributes** you need
- [ ] **Generate and download** the Excel template
- [ ] **Open the template** in Microsoft Excel
- [ ] **Fill in your product data** (start with 5-10 products)
- [ ] **Double-check all required fields** are completed
- [ ] **Save the completed file**

### Upload and Submit

- [ ] **Go to the Upload page**
- [ ] **Upload your completed Excel file**
- [ ] **Review the validation results** on the preview screen
- [ ] **Fix any validation errors** if needed
- [ ] **Confirm the upload** to submit your batch

### Monitor and Respond

- [ ] **Note your batch number** for reference
- [ ] **Check the Batches page** to see your batch status
- [ ] **Enable notifications** to receive status updates
- [ ] **Wait for admin review** (typically 24-48 hours)
- [ ] **Respond to feedback** if your batch is rejected

## Navigation Tips

### Keyboard Shortcuts

- **Esc** - Close modals and dialogs
- **Tab** - Navigate between form fields
- **Enter** - Submit forms or confirm actions

### Filtering and Searching

Most list pages include filtering options:

- Use the **search box** to find specific products by name or SKU
- Use **filter dropdowns** to narrow results by status, batch, date, etc.
- Click **Clear Filters** to reset and view all items

### Status Badges

Learn to recognize status indicators:

- 游리 **Pending** - Yellow badge, awaiting review
- 游릭 **Approved** - Green badge, accepted
- 游댮 **Rejected** - Red badge, needs correction
- 游댯 **Draft** - Blue badge, not yet submitted

### Pagination

Long lists are paginated:

- Use **Previous** and **Next** buttons to navigate pages
- Select **items per page** to control how many items are displayed
- Jump to a specific page using the page number buttons

## Best Practices

### Data Quality

- **Use accurate, complete information** for all products
- **Double-check SKUs** to ensure they're unique and correct
- **Provide detailed descriptions** to help with product identification
- **Use consistent naming conventions** across your products

### Template Management

- **Download fresh templates** for each new category or attribute set
- **Never modify the header row** in the template
- **Keep backup copies** of your completed templates
- **Use descriptive filenames** (e.g., "Acme_Shirts_2024-01-15.xlsx")

### Upload Strategy

- **Start small** - Upload 5-10 products first to test the process
- **Test validation** - Ensure your data format is correct before large uploads
- **Upload in batches** - Keep batches to 50-100 products for easier management
- **Upload during business hours** - Admins can review faster during work hours

### Communication

- **Read rejection feedback carefully** - Admins provide specific guidance
- **Ask questions** - Contact your administrator if you're unsure about requirements
- **Respond promptly** - Fix and resubmit rejected batches quickly
- **Keep records** - Save copies of uploaded files and batch numbers

### Security

- **Never share your credentials** with anyone
- **Use a strong, unique password** for your account
- **Sign out** when you're done or stepping away from your computer
- **Report suspicious activity** to your administrator

## Common First-Time Questions

### How long does batch review take?

Typically 24-48 hours during business days. You'll receive a notification when your batch is reviewed.

### What happens if my batch is rejected?

You'll receive a notification with feedback from the administrator. Review the feedback, correct the issues, and upload a new batch with the corrected data.

### Can I edit products after uploading?

No, once uploaded, products cannot be edited directly. If you need to make changes, you'll need to upload a new batch with the corrected information.

### How many products can I upload at once?

There's no strict limit, but we recommend batches of 50-100 products for easier management and faster review.

### What if I make a mistake in the template?

If you catch it before uploading, simply fix it in Excel and save. If you've already uploaded, you can upload a new batch with corrections.

### Can I use Google Sheets or LibreOffice?

While these tools can open Excel files, we strongly recommend using Microsoft Excel for best results. Some features may not work correctly in other applications.

### Support

If you need assistance:

- **Contact your administrator** - They can help with account and permission issues
- **Email support**: support@vendorportal.com
- **Response Time**: Within 24 hours on business days
- **Include**: Screenshots, error messages, batch numbers, and steps to reproduce any issues
